allow:
Bash(# Check each file
files=(
  ""chunk-strategies""
  ""dynamic-chunk-strategies""
  ""query-adaptive-strategy""
  ""smart-chunker""
  ""spatial-hierarchy-strategy""
  ""config""
  ""attribute-extractor""
  ""in-memory-chunk-system""
  ""index""
  ""context-assembler""
  ""context-selector-simplified""
  ""context-selector""
  ""index-query-optimizer""
  ""query-analyzer""
  ""relevance-scorer""
  ""token-budget-manager""
  ""batch-processor""
  ""cache-manager""
  ""cached-file-store""
  ""file-store""
  ""manifest-manager""
  ""chunk-logger""
  ""enhanced-chunk-logger""
  ""entity-converter""
  ""token-counter""
)

for file in ""${files[@]}""; do
  count=$(rg -l ""$file"" -g ""*.ts"" -g ""*.tsx"" -g ""!*$file.ts"" . 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
  if [ ""$count"" -eq 0 ]; then
    echo ""❌ NOT IMPORTED: $file""
  else
    echo ""✅ IMPORTED: $file (found in $count files)""
  fi
done)
